entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:29 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
